name: 3D Audio Visualizer
description:
3D Audio Visualizer 

Audio Visualizer is a feature found in electronic music visualizers and media player software, generates animated imagery based on a piece of music. The imagery is usually generated and rendered in real time and in a way synchronized with the music as it is played. In this project, I have successfully made a workable audio visualizer that can visualize beats and frequencies based from the chosen music.

API : OpenGL
Programming Language : C++
Music : Bohemian Rhapsody
Module : Graphics Programming
Duration : 5 Weeks (Mar 2019 - Apr 2019)
